title: Celestial Diamond and Gold Chain - A Delicate Shringar
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) featuring brilliant-cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster. Gold weight: 4.910 grams. Total Diamond weight: 2.28 carats.
features: This delicate gold chain is adorned with meticulously placed diamond floral motifs. Each motif features a cluster of brilliant-cut diamonds set in a secure prong setting to maximize their brilliance. The design blends a modern aesthetic with subtle nods to traditional Indian floral patterns. The chain itself consists of multiple interwoven strands creating a luxurious drape and feel.
colors: Luminous Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or to add a touch of understated elegance to special occasions such as a cocktail party
engagement ceremony or a festive gathering. A beautiful gift for birthdays
description: This piece offers the perfect blend of modern sophistication and timeless elegance. Crafted with the highest quality gold and sparkling diamonds, this chain is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and enduring beauty. The delicate design makes it versatile enough to be worn alone or layered with other necklaces. The diamonds add a touch of subtle luxury, making it a truly special piece to cherish for years to come.
